net.centro.rtb.monitoringcenter.config

Class Configurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.centro.rtb.monitoringcenter.config.Configurator

  • public class Configurator
extends Object
    A bootstrapping class, allowing for convenient configuration of MonitoringCenter. This class provides an ability to configure MonitoringCenter using a provided config file, a default config file, or indicate that no config file is to be used.

    In all cases, the clients will be able to override any config file parameters programmatically.

    • Method Detail

      • configFile

        public static MonitoringCenterConfig.Builder configFile(File configFile)
        Obtains a MonitoringCenterConfig builder, pre-filled with a given config file in the YAML format. The client can override any config file property programmatically via a builder's method. To finalize the configuration, the MonitoringCenterConfig.Builder.build() method should be called.
        Parameters:
        configFile - a config file in the YAML format.
        Returns:
        a MonitoringCenterConfig builder pre-filled with the properties from the config file.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if config file is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if config file does not exist.

      • noConfigFile

        public static MonitoringCenterConfig.Builder noConfigFile()
        Obtains a MonitoringCenterConfig builder with default parameters. This method should be used when exclusively programmatic configuration is desired. When no config file is provided, the MonitoringCenter's configuration cannot be changed dynamically. To finalize the configuration, the MonitoringCenterConfig.Builder.build() method should be called.
        Returns:
        a MonitoringCenterConfig builder with default parameters.

      • defaultConfigFile

        public static MonitoringCenterConfig.Builder defaultConfigFile()
        Obtains a MonitoringCenterConfig builder, pre-filled with the default config file in the YAML format. The default config file should be named DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE_NAME and it will be looked up on the classpath.

        The client can override any config file property programmatically via a builder's method. To finalize the configuration, the MonitoringCenterConfig.Builder.build() method should be called.
        Returns:
        a MonitoringCenterConfig builder pre-filled with the properties from the default config file.
        Throws:
        ConfigException - if config file does not exist.
